trans-unit.source: Missing values are checked separately from valid values. A mask of missing values is computed for each and checked to match. The remaining all-valid values are cast to object dtype and checked.
trans-unit.target: 缺失值与有效值分开检查。为每个缺失值计算一个掩码,并检查是否匹配。其余的所有有效值被转为对象dtype并进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Missing values are ignored and each entry is computed using the pairwise complete observations. Please see the covariance section for caveats associated with this method of calculating covariance and correlation matrices.
trans-unit.target: 缺失值将被忽略，并且使用成对的完整观测值来计算每个条目。请参见协方差部分，了解与这种计算协方差和相关矩阵的方法有关的警告。

trans-unit.source: Missing values are indicated in
trans-unit.target: 缺少的数值用

trans-unit.source: Missing values are indicated in labels with na_sentinel (-1 by default). Note that missing values are never included in uniques.
trans-unit.target: 缺失值在带有 na_sentinel 的 labels 中表示（默认为 -1 ）。请注意， uniques 值永远不会包含缺少的值。

trans-unit.source: Missing values are not considered empty:
trans-unit.target: 缺少的值不视为空值。

trans-unit.source: Missing values are not considered. The following is 2.0, not NaN, even though NaN is at the index location for 30.
trans-unit.target: 缺失值不被考虑。即使NaN处于 30 的索引位置，以下也是 2.0 而不是NaN 。

trans-unit.source: Missing values are not included as a category.
trans-unit.target: 缺少的数值不作为一个类别列入。

trans-unit.source: Missing values on either side will result in missing values in the result as well, unlessna_rep is specified:
trans-unit.target: 除非指定了 na_rep ，否则任一侧的缺失值也将导致结果中的缺失值：

trans-unit.source: Missing values present before the upsampling are not affected.
trans-unit.target: 上升采样前存在的缺失值不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Missing values propagate naturally through arithmetic operations between pandas objects.
trans-unit.target: 缺失的值通过pandas对象之间的算术运算自然传播。

trans-unit.source: Missing values should not be included in the Categorical’s categories, only in the values. Instead, it is understood that NaN is different, and is always a possibility. When working with the Categorical’s codes, missing values will always have a code of -1.
trans-unit.target: 缺失值应不列入范畴的 categories ，只有在 values 。相反，可以理解的是，NaN是不同的，并且总是可能的。使用分类 codes ，缺失值将始终为 -1 。

trans-unit.source: Most of the examples will utilize the tips dataset found within pandas tests. We’ll read the data into a DataFrame called tips and assume we have a database table of the same name and structure.
trans-unit.target: 大多数示例将利用在熊猫测试中找到的 tips 数据集。我们将把数据读入一个称为 tips 的DataFrame中，并假设我们有一个具有相同名称和结构的数据库表。

trans-unit.source: Most pandas classes, methods and data attributes can be autocompleted in Spyder’s Editor and IPython Console, and Spyder’s Help pane can retrieve and render Numpydoc documentation on pandas objects in rich text with Sphinx both automatically and on-demand.
trans-unit.target: 大多数熊猫类，方法和数据属性都可以在Spyder的Editor和IPython Console中自动完成，并且Spyder的“ 帮助”窗格可以使用Sphinx自动和按需检索并以富文本格式显示熊猫对象上的Numpydoc文档。

trans-unit.source: Most pandas plots use the label and color arguments (note the lack of “s” on those). To be consistent with matplotlib.pyplot.pie() you must use labels and colors.
trans-unit.target: 大多数熊猫图都使用 label 和 color 参数（请注意，在其上缺少“ s”）。为了与 matplotlib.pyplot.pie() 保持一致，您必须使用 labels 和 colors 。

trans-unit.source: Most plotting methods have a set of keyword arguments that control the layout and formatting of the returned plot:

trans-unit.source: Note that pandas infers column dtypes from query outputs, and not by looking up data types in the physical database schema. For example, assume userid is an integer column in a table. Then, intuitively, select userid ... will return integer-valued series, while select cast(userid as text) ... will return object-valued (str) series. Accordingly, if the query output is empty, then all resulting columns will be returned as object-valued (since they are most general). If you foresee that your query will sometimes generate an empty result, you may want to explicitly typecast afterwards to ensure dtype integrity.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，pandas从查询输出推断列dtype，而不是通过在物理数据库模式中查找数据类型来推断。例如，假设 userid 是表中的整数列。然后，直观地， select userid ... 将返回整数值系列，而 select cast(userid as text) ... 将返回对象值（str）系列。因此，如果查询输出为空，则所有结果列将作为对象值返回（因为它们是最通用的）。如果您预见到查询有时会生成空结果，则可能需要在之后进行显式类型转换，以确保dtype完整性。

Later on we’ll see that something like highlight_max is already defined on Styler so you wouldn’t need to write this yourself.
trans-unit.target: 现在，假设您要突出显示每列中的最大值。我们不能再使用 .applymap 了，因为它逐个元素地操作。相反，我们将转到 .apply ，它按列（或使用 axis 关键字按行）操作。稍后我们会看到类似 highlight_max 已经定义 Styler 的，所以你就不需要写自己。

trans-unit.source: Now we’ll implement an out-of-core value_counts. The peak memory usage of this workflow is the single largest chunk, plus a small series storing the unique value counts up to this point. As long as each individual file fits in memory, this will work for arbitrary-sized datasets.

trans-unit.source: Numba can also be used to write vectorized functions that do not require the user to explicitly loop over the observations of a vector; a vectorized function will be applied to each row automatically. Consider the following toy example of doubling each observation:
trans-unit.target: Numba还可以用来编写向量化函数,这些函数不需要用户显式地对向量的观测值进行循环,向量化函数将自动应用到每一行。考虑下面这个将每个观测值翻倍的玩具例子。

trans-unit.source: Numba engine
trans-unit.target: Numba发动机

trans-unit.source: Numba gives you the power to speed up your applications with high performance functions written directly in Python. With a few annotations, array-oriented and math-heavy Python code can be just-in-time compiled to native machine instructions, similar in performance to C, C++ and Fortran, without having to switch languages or Python interpreters.
trans-unit.target: Numba为您提供了直接用Python编写的高性能函数来加速您的应用程序的能力。通过一些注释,面向数组和数学的Python代码可以及时编译成本地机器指令,性能类似于C、C++和Fortran,而无需切换语言或Python解释器。

trans-unit.source: Numba is best at accelerating functions that apply numerical functions to NumPy arrays. When passed a function that only uses operations it knows how to accelerate, it will execute in nopython mode.
trans-unit.target: Numba最擅长加速将数值函数应用于NumPy数组的函数。当传递仅使用操作的函数时，它将知道如何加速，它将在 nopython 模式下执行。

trans-unit.source: Numba will execute on any function, but can only accelerate certain classes of functions.
trans-unit.target: Numba将对任何函数执行,但只能加速某些类别的函数。

trans-unit.source: Numba works by generating optimized machine code using the LLVM compiler infrastructure at import time, runtime, or statically (using the included pycc tool). Numba supports compilation of Python to run on either CPU or GPU hardware, and is designed to integrate with the Python scientific software stack.
trans-unit.target: Numba的工作方式是在导入时、运行时或静态(使用包含的pycc工具)使用LLVM编译器基础设施生成优化的机器代码。Numba支持编译Python以在CPU或GPU硬件上运行,并被设计为与Python科学软件栈集成。

trans-unit.source: Odo provides a uniform API for moving data between different formats. It uses pandas own read_csv for CSV IO and leverages many existing packages such as PyTables, h5py, and pymongo to move data between non pandas formats. Its graph based approach is also extensible by end users for custom formats that may be too specific for the core of odo.
